Facilities: Dr. McLuhan would have to travel a good deal in order to consult with—
a wide variety of persons in all phases of media work today and to use as resources many
projects in progress, both in the U.S. and Canada. He would also need to set up several
original text experiments and demonstrations for testing the intelligibility, teachability
and validity of the materials developed.
Several firm offers of cooperation have already been received to cooperation in this
project, including invitations from Boston University; Educational TV Station KTCA on behalf
also of the Public Schools of St. Paul, Minnesota; and St. David's School in New York.
